Attacks.Name: Poison Sting
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: String Shot
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Shield Dust
Superpowers.Effect: This character is immune to the effects of wild rolls from enemy attacks.

Attacks.Name: Bug Bite
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character heals 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Adaptability
Superpowers.Effect: When this character is attacked, it may change one of its blank results to a hit result.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Kakuna character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
